data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:The Classic Years of Nat King Cole]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You) - Nat King Cole
[00:12.37]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:16.33]
[00:19.25]Jack Frost nipping at your nose
[00:23.23]
[00:26.06]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[00:30.77]
[00:32.19]And folks dressed up like Eskimos
[00:36.62]
[00:37.76]Everybody knows a turkey and some
[00:42.32]Mistletoe help to make the season bright
[00:50.83]
[00:53.72]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[00:58.39]
[00:58.94]Will find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:03.80]
[01:05.94]They know that Santa's on his way
[01:11.96]
[01:12.97]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies
[01:16.57]On his sleigh
[01:18.83]
[01:19.74]And every mother's
[01:21.06]Child is gonna spy to see
[01:27.46]If Reindeer really know how to fly
[01:32.48]
[01:33.91]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[01:41.21]
[01:42.64]To kids from one to ninety-two
[01:47.69]
[01:49.93]Altho' it's been said many times
[01:53.85]Many ways
[01:55.57]Merry Christmas to you
[02:01.43]
[02:31.08]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[02:37.90]
[02:40.28]To kids from one to ninety-two
[02:44.95]
[02:47.37]Altho' it's been said many times
[02:51.11]Many ways
[02:53.00]Merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:The Christmas Song (祝你圣诞快乐！)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:The Classic Years of Nat King Cole]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.37]篝火上烤着栗子
[00:16.33]
[00:19.25]刺骨地冰霜正吹向你们的鼻子
[00:23.23]
[00:26.06]唱诗班正在唱着圣诞颂歌
[00:30.77]
[00:32.19]人们打扮地就像是爱斯基摩人
[00:36.62]
[00:37.76]人人都知道火鸡和槲寄生
[00:42.32]可以使圣诞更有气氛
[00:50.83]
[00:53.72]小孩们的眼里都闪着光
[00:58.39]
[00:58.94]会发现今晚他们将兴奋地难以入眠
[01:03.80]
[01:05.94]他们知道圣诞老人已经在来的路上
[01:11.96]
[01:12.97]他在雪橇上
[01:16.57]装了很多的玩具和糖果
[01:18.83]
[01:19.74]每家的小孩
[01:21.06]都想去发现
[01:27.46]去看驯鹿是不是真的知道怎样飞
[01:32.48]
[01:33.91]于是我将这简单的话语
[01:41.21]
[01:42.64]送给一岁到九十二岁的孩子们
[01:47.69]
[01:49.93]用了很多种方法
[01:53.85]很多种方法
[01:55.57]祝你圣诞快乐！
[02:01.43]
[02:31.08]于是我将这简单的话语
[02:37.90]
[02:40.28]送给一岁到九十二岁的孩子们
[02:44.95]
[02:47.37]用了很多种方法
[02:51.11]很多种方法
[02:53.00]祝你圣诞快乐！
